mapper.insert: insert into t_log (uuid, datetime, level, inorout, remote_ip, remote_user, remote_agent, request_url, request_method, status_code, log_value) values (#{uuid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{datetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inorout,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remoteIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remoteUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remoteAgent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{requestUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{requestMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statusCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{logValue,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
